forecasts.raw_text: SW winds 15 to 20 kt. Seas 4 to 6 ft. Wave detail: S 6 ft at 6 seconds and NE 4 ft at 12 seconds. A slight chance of showers early, then a chance of showers late. Patchy fog early. Patchy fog late with vsby 1 nm or less.

forecasts.raw_text: W winds 10 to 15 kt. Seas 4 to 6 ft. Wave detail: S 5 ft at 7 seconds and NE 3 ft at 11 seconds. Patchy fog. A slight chance of rain after midnight. Vsby 1 nm or less.

forecasts.raw_text: NE winds 5 to 10 kt, increasing to 10 to 15 kt after midnight. Seas 2 to 3 ft. Wave detail: NE 3 ft at 11 seconds and SE 2 ft at 6 seconds. A chance of rain in the evening, then rain likely after midnight.
forecasts.wind_commentary: increasing to 10 to 15 kt after midnight
forecasts.wave_detail_string: NE 3 ft at 11 seconds and SE 2 ft at 6 seconds

forecasts.raw_text: NE winds 10 to 15 kt, becoming N 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt in the afternoon. Seas 3 to 5 ft, building to 5 to 7 ft in the afternoon. Wave detail: NE 5 ft at 10 seconds and SE 3 ft at 6 seconds, becoming NE 6 ft at 7 seconds and S 3 ft at 7 seconds. A slight chance of tstms. Showers.

forecasts.raw_text: NW winds 20 to 25 kt. Seas 6 to 9 ft. A chance of snow in the morning. A chance of rain.
